tool_description: Validates game assets for technical compliance, quality standards, and engine compatibility issues.

asset_id.description: ID of the asset to validate

validation_type.description: Validation scope: technical, quality, performance, compatibility, all

strict_mode.description: Whether to apply strict validation rules

error_messages: Asset not found: Provide a valid asset_id from a previous creation tool
Invalid validation type: Use one of [technical, quality, performance, compatibility, all]
Asset corrupted: The asset file appears to be damaged or incomplete
usage: Provide asset_id and choose validation_type based on what aspects you want to check. Enable strict_mode for production-ready assets that need to meet higher standards.

validation_id.description: Unique identifier for this validation report

errors.description: List of error messages found during validation

warnings.description: List of warning messages found during validation
